data.title: Kaiju No. 8 Chapter 110: Release Date, Time, What to Expect, and More
data.meta_description: The eagerly awaited Kaiju No. 8 chapter 110 is scheduled for release on Friday, July 5, 2024, at 12 AM JST, as confirmed by the MANGA Plus website.
data.text:
Last Updated on 4 July 2024 by Arman Deep Sharma

The eagerly awaited Kaiju No. 8 chapter 110 is scheduled for release on Friday, July 5, 2024, at 12 AM JST, as confirmed by the MANGA Plus website.

With the preliminary formalities, such as Kafka’s promise to Mina concluded, fans are now keenly anticipating the focus shifting towards the intense battle against Kaiju No. 9.

As of now, there are no spoilers available for Kaiju No. 8 chapter 110.

This is not unusual for Shonen Jump+ series, where the fully digital publication process makes it challenging to obtain spoiler information ahead of the release date.

However, fans can at least be assured of the official release schedule for the upcoming chapter.

This article provides a comprehensive breakdown of all currently available release information for Kaiju No. 8 chapter 110, along with some speculation on what might unfold in the next installment.

Kaiju No. 8 chapter 110 is set to release at 12 AM JST on Friday, July 5, 2024.

For most international fans, this translates to a Thursday morning release, with the exact time varying by region and timezone.

Below are the release times for various time zones:

Where to Read Kaiju No. 8 Chapter 110

Fans can read Kaiju No. 8 Chapter 110 through official sources like Viz Media’s website, Shueisha’s MANGA Plus website, or the Shonen Jump+ app.

Viz Media and MANGA Plus offer free access to the first and latest three chapters of the series, while the Shonen Jump+ app provides a subscription-based service for access to the entire series.

Recap of Kaiju No. 8 Chapter 109

Chapter 109 of Kaiju No. 8 delves into a flashback from Mina and Kafka’s childhood, where they discuss their aspirations for the Defense Force.

Kafka dreams of achieving a 99% release force, becoming a master swordsman, and the strongest gunner.

Mina, on the other hand, wants to be a troop member who saves everyone deployed with her.

Kafka teases her before genuinely supporting her dreams.

The narrative then shifts to the present, where Mina humorously calls Kafka a liar and criticizes him for trying to handle everything alone.

Kafka apologizes for not living up to his own expectations, and Mina admits she hasn’t met her ideals either.

Despite their self-criticism, they decide to keep pushing forward. At this point, Kaiju No. 9 stirs, with the No. 2 head still protruding from its body.

As Kafka and Mina prepare for battle, Mina thanks Kafka for being by her side.

Kafka realizes that standing by Mina is the one childhood dream he can still fulfill.

The two promise to exterminate the Kaiju together.

The chapter ends with a poignant panel of their childhood selves before returning to the present, where their adult selves are ready to face Kaiju No. 9.

Speculations for Kaiju No. 8 Chapter 110

Following Mina and Kafka’s resolute decision to fight and defeat No. 9, fans are on the edge of their seats, eager to see the next significant development in this climactic battle.

The upcoming chapter is likely to set the stage for the final act of the fight, highlighting the teamwork and strategies that Mina and Kafka will employ against No. 9.

However, it’s also possible that Kaiju No. 9 has more tricks up its sleeve, which could be unveiled in chapter 110 and subsequent chapters.

This unpredictability makes it challenging to determine who might gain the upper hand next in the battle.

Final Words

As Kaiju No. 8 chapter 110 approaches, the excitement among fans is palpable.

With a release date set for July 5, 2024, at 12 AM JST, readers across the globe are gearing up to witness the next phase of Kafka and Mina’s epic confrontation with Kaiju No. 9.

While specific details about the upcoming chapter remain under wraps, the anticipation and speculation only add to the thrill of the unfolding story.

Fans can look forward to reading the new chapter on official platforms like Viz Media, MANGA Plus, and the Shonen Jump+ app.

Whether it’s through the emotional flashbacks or the intense present-day battles, Kaiju No. 8 continues to captivate its audience with its blend of action, character development, and storytelling.

As we wait for chapter 110, the promise of an exhilarating showdown keeps the excitement alive.
